DOC.brief_title: Fit For Function : A Community Wellness Program Persons With Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The program deliver partnership McMaster University , YMCA Hamilton Health Sciences/ Brant Community Healthcare System/ Niagara Health System . Participants exercise three time week receive weekly education take care stroke . The YMCA staff deliver program specialize training help people stroke exercise safely effectively . The hospital within region provide specialized on-site physiotherapy consultative support . The comparator standard YMCA membership include typical session wellness coach basic safety training regard stroke exercise .
